name: Entrenamientos Aeronáuticos Las Américas (ENALAS)
about: Entrenamientos Aeronáuticos Las Américas (ENALAS) is a premier flying school in the Dominican Republic, established on March 25, 2002. Certified by the Instituto Dominicano de Aviación Civil (IDAC), ENALAS aims to enhance the professional quality of the aeronautical community through internationally compliant programs. Located in Santo Domingo, the school boasts its own aircraft, a certified maintenance workshop, and highly experienced instructors. ENALAS offers various training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL) and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), along with financing options and state-of-the-art flight simulators. With a strong focus on safety and operational excellence, ENALAS provides a comprehensive and supportive environment for aspiring pilots to achieve their aviation dreams. Start your aviation journey with ENALAS and secure your future in the skies.
services:
["Private Pilot
Instrument Enablement
Commercial Pilot Training
Multi-engine aircraft
Private Pilot
